metadata.title: Crop Image - Online for Free, Instantly, No Watermarks
metadata.description: Crop image online for free with our easy-to-use tool. No downloads, no registration, no watermarks—just fast and unlimited image cropping. Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, WEBP and more!
metadata.keywords: crop image, resize image, crop photo, cut image, crop picture, free online image cropper, online photo crop, image cropping tool, image cropper, unlimited image crop

home.h1_p: Crop image instantly—100% free, no downloads, no registration. Unlimited use, no watermarks. Resize and crop in just a few clicks. Upload and crop now!
home.batch_h1: Fast & Free Batch Image Cropping Tool
home.batch_h1_p: Easily crop multiple images at once with our fast and free online batch cropping tool. Upload, adjust, and download your cropped images in seconds. No software required!
home.upload_hint: You can upload multiple images at once

home.convert_upload_hint: You can upload multiple images at once

howToUse.h2: How to Crop Image Online for Free
howToUse.h2_p: To crop image online for free, follow these steps:
howToUse.h3_1_p: Upload your image by clicking the "Choose Image" button or simply drag and drop your file into the upload area. You can also paste an image URL if you prefer.
howToUse.h3_2_p: Use the crop frame to select the area you want to keep. You can zoom in and out using the Zoom button, or rotate the angle of the crop area using the Rotation button.
howToUse.h3_3_p: There are 9 aspect ratios to choose from, each of which can be previewed. Select the aspect ratio that best suits your needs.
howToUse.h3_4_p: There are 2 crop shapes and 3 output formats to choose from. Choose the one that best suits your needs.
howToUse.h3_5_p: Adjust the crop dimensions and position using the control panel. You can enter precise values for width, height, shape, position and output format.
howToUse.h3_6_p: Click the "Crop Image" button to download your cropped image. The result will maintain the original image quality without any watermarks.

faqInfo.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqInfo.desc: Here are some of the most frequently asked questions about Crop Image. If you have a question about Crop Image that is not answered here, please feel free to reach out to us via the contact form on this website.

q1.q: Is this image cropper free to use?
q1.a: Yes, our online image cropper is 100% free with no hidden fees.

q2.q: Do I need to download any software?
q2.a: No, our tool works entirely online, so there's no need to download anything.

q3.q: Do I need to create an account?
q3.a: No, you can use our site to crop image without registration.

q4.a: No, all images cropped using our tool are completely watermark-free.

q5.q: Is there a limit on how many images I can crop?
q5.a: No, you can crop unlimited images without any restrictions.

q6.a: Our tool supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, BMP, and other popular formats.

q7.a: Yes, we do not store or share your uploaded images.

q8.q: Can I crop image on my phone?
q8.a: Yes, our tool works on all devices, including mobile phones and tablets.

q9.q: Does the tool work on Mac and Windows?
q9.a: Yes, it works on any device with a web browser, including Mac, Windows, and Linux.

q10.a: Simply upload your image, select the area you want to keep, and download the cropped image.

q11.q: Can I crop image to a specific size?
q11.a: Yes, you can manually adjust the crop area to any size you need.

q12.q: Is there a file size limit for uploads?
q12.a: Yes, you can upload any image under 10M.

q13.q: Can I crop multiple images at once?
q13.a: Currently, our tool supports cropping one image at a time.

q14.q: Does the crop image tool reduce image quality?
q14.a: No, the cropped image retains its original quality.

q15.q: Can I rotate or flip the image while cropping?
q15.a: Yes, you can rotate and flip images before cropping.

q16.q: Does the crop image tool support transparent images?
q16.a: Yes, it supports images with transparency, such as PNG files.

q17.q: Can I undo or reset my crop image selection?
q17.a: Yes, you can reset or adjust your selection before downloading.

q18.q: Is the crop image tool available in different languages?
q18.a: Currently, we support English, but more languages will be added soon.

q19.q: Do I need an internet connection to use this crop image tool?
q19.a: Yes, since it's an online crop image tool, an internet connection is required.

q20.q: Is this crop image tool completely ad-free?
q20.a: No, but you can ignore any advertisements that may appear on the website.
